Verses: 1 eesaayennum Adimaraththilirundhu Oru Thulir Thondri, Avan Vergalilirundhu Oru Kilai Ezhumbi Sezhikkum.

2 gnaanaththaiyum Unarvaiyum Arulum Aaviyum, Aalosanaiyaiyum Belanaiyum Arulum Aaviyum, Arivaiyum Karththarukku Bayappadugira Bayaththaiyum Arulum Aaviyumaagiya Karththarudaiya Aaviyaanavar Avarmel Thangiyiruppaar.
3 karththarukku Bayappadudhal Avarukku Ugandha Vaasanaiyaayirukkum; Avar Thamadhu Kan Kandapadi Nyaayantheerkkaamalum, Thamadhu Kaadhu Kettapadi Theerppuchcheyyaamalum,

4 needhiyinpadi Ezhaigalai Nyaayam Visaariththu, Yadhaarththaththinpadi Boomiyilulla Sirumaiyaanavargalukkuth Theerppuchcheydhu, Boomiyaith Thamadhu Vaakkin Kolaal Adiththu, Thamadhu Vaayin Suvaasaththaal Dhunmaarkkarai Sangarippaar.
5 needhi Avarukku Araikkattum, Saththiyam Avarukku Idaikkachchaiyumaayirukkum.
6 appozhudhu Onaai Aattukkuttiyode Thangum, Puli Vellaattukkuttiyode Paduththukkollum; Kandrukkuttiyum, Paalasingamum, Kaalaiyum, Orumiththirukkum; Oru Siru Paiyan Avaigalai Nadaththuvaan.
7 pasuvum Karadiyum Koodimeyum, Avaigalin Kuttigal Orumiththuppaduththukkollum; Singam Maattaippol Vaikkol Thinnum.
8 paal Kudikkunkuzhandhai Viriyanpaambu Valaiyinmel Vilaiyaadum, Paal Marandha Pillai Kattuviriyan Putrile Than Kaiyai Vaikkum,
9 en Parisuththa Parvadhamengum Theenguseyvaarumillai; Keduseyvaarumillai; Samuththiram Jalaththinaal Niraindhirukkiradhupol, Boomi Karththarai Arigira Arivinaal Niraindhirukkum.
10 akkaalaththile, Janangalukkuk Kodiyaaga Nirkum Eesaayin Verukkaaga Jaadhigal Visaariththuk Ketpaargal; Avarudaiya Thaabarasthalam Magimaiyaayirukkum,

11 akkaalaththile, Aandavar Aseeriyaavilum, Egipthilum, Padhrosilum, Eththiyoppiyaavilum, Persiyaavilum, Sineyaarilum, Aamaaththilum, Samuththirath Theevugalilum, Thammudaiya Janaththil Meedhiyaanavargalai Meettukkollath Thirumba Irandaamvisai Thamadhu Karaththai Neetti,
12 jaadhigalukku Oru Kodiyai Etri, Isravelil Thuraththundavargalai Serththu, Yoodhaavil Sidharadikkappattavargalai Boomiyin Naangu Thisaigalilumirundhu Koottuvaar.
13 eppiraayeemin Poraamai Neengum, Yoodhaavin Saththurukkal Sangarikkappaduvaargal; Eppiraayeem Yoodhaavinmel Poraamaiyaayiraan, Yoodhaa Eppiraayeemaith Thunbappaduththaan.

14 avargal Iruvarum Egamaaikkoodi Merkeyirukkira Pelistharudaiya Ellaigalinmel Paaindhu, Keezhththisaiyaaraik Kollaiyittu, Edhominmelum Movaabinmelum Kaipoduvaargal; Ammon Puththirar Avargalukkuk Keezhppadivaargal.

15 egipthin Samuththiramunaiyaik Karththar Mutrilum Azhiththu, Thammudaiya Kaatrin Valumaiyinaal Nadhiyinmel Thamadhu Kaiyai Neetti, Ezhaarugalaagap Piriththu, Janangal Kaalnanaiyaamal Kadandhupogumpadi Pannuvaar.
16 isravelar Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Purappattanaalil Avargalukku Irundhadhupola, Aseeriyaavile Avarudaiya Janaththil Meedhiyaanavargalukku Oru Perumpaadhaiyirukkum.
